hits.snippet: Cast your burden upon Jehovah. Your burden can also be translated as “that which He [Jehovah] gives you,” or, “that which He gives you to bear,” or, “the portion assigned to you.” “The saints’ burdens are God-given” [Editor’s note: Streams in the Desert by L. B. Cowman]. Verses 6 and 22 show that our burdens are our wings. God places these burdens on us, not to overwhelm us but to bear us. These burdens cause us to “wait on Jehovah” so that we would “mount up with wings like eagles” (Isa. 40:31). (Bible 3)
